expo.name: BallerMap
expo.description: An app that uses your location to find basketball courts near users

infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: BallerMap requires geolocation to allow users to see Basketball courts near them with the help of a map
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: BallerMap requires geolocation to allow users to see Basketball courts near them with the help of a map
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: BallerMap requires geolocation to allow users to see Basketball courts near them with the help of a map
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: BallerMap accesses your photos to let you set your profile picture.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: BallerMap accesses your photos to let you set your profile picture.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: BallerMap accesses your camera to let you set your profile picture.
infoPlist.NSAppTransportSecurity: Allow BallerMap to make http requests to its servers
